info.title: M-Path
info.description: Automatic Speech Recognition and Voice Emotion Recognition

post.description: For the best results, use audio files with a sample rate of 16 kHz and 16 bits per sample.

get.description: This endpoint accepts a `result_id` parameter and returns the analysis results.

post.description: Calculate emotional score of the call
Extract main keywords of the call
List actions that agent accomplished during the call
List phrases where customer asks agent to do something
List the discussed problems from the transcript
Divide conversation to intro, negatiation, outro
Find all phrases containing questions that customer asked
Convert transcript into a summary of the call
Extract main topics of the call

get.description: Get all available options for the recognition config

post.description:
When a processing result is ready we'll send you a POST request with this
data to the URL that you specified in processing request config.

AgentActions.title: AgentActions
AgentActions.description: Find all actions that agent accomplished during the call

CustomerRequests.title: CustomerRequests
CustomerRequests.description: Find all customer requests during the call

Division.title: Division
Division.description: Divide conversation to introduction, negotiation, resolution

DivisionModel.title: DivisionModel
DivisionModel.description: Converstion division to parts introduction - negotiation - resolution

Problems.title: Problems
Problems.description: Find all problems that were discussed during the call

Questions.title: Questions
Questions.description: Find all phrases containing questions that customer asked during the call

Summary.title: Summary
Summary.description: Convert call transcript into a summary of the call
